website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for women looking for a high-quality product with helpful accessories.
pros: Fabric constructed to be ultra-stretchy and flexible
Super seal neck helps keep water out of suit
Reviewers love using this wetsuit for surfing
cons: Many customers complained that the neck area was too tight

customer_reviews.title: Yes, the neck is tight.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and tried it on, and the neck is indeed very tight, as several other reviewers have said. I knew that going in, but thought it wouldn't be a problem because I have a slender-to-average-size neck. But it is really super-tight, to the point of being uncomfortable, particularly if you bend your neck slightly to look down instead of straight ahead. Otherwise, it is a great suit and seems really well made. But I'm on the fence about keeping this because of the neck problem. Fit information: I'm 6 feet, 160 pounds, and the 12 fits well--snug but comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great Wetsuit!...After Modifying The Neck
customer_reviews.text: Bought this size 8 for my GF who is 5-1, 115lbs, big chest. Fits fine though the material going up the neck was very tight. She fixed it by cutting the entire elastic/faux leather material going up the neck so now the suit ends at the base of her neck. Problem solved. Think this Phantom wet suit overall fits somewhat small as a size 6 for her would have been too small. So far so good for her in this Phantom Aquatics wetsuit snorkeling and boogie boarding in Makena Maui.
customer_reviews.author: Siffert

customer_reviews.title: Hard to breath because of neck
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit, color and lengths were good. The neck was so tight, it restricted my breathing. I don't really have a fat neck. 5'9" 165#s
customer_reviews.author: Grass valley woman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this wetsuit! Well made, easy to get into and cute. Only suggestion is to have a Velcro tab to secure the zipper from moving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Easy on, easy off. Yes the neck is snug...but it keeps the cold water OUT!
customer_reviews.author: RealLife WithMimi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Better then I ever could have expected. Love it. Get lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Stina Redfield

customer_reviews.title: Great Wetsuit,
customer_reviews.text: I got this wetsuit for surfing and it's perfect, fit's nice quality stretching fabric and looks very nice...
customer_reviews.author: Herty

customer_reviews.title: Posted reviews for wrong item !!
customer_reviews.text: Read carefully the reviews (for a size 8 Women Shorty Wetsuit) almost all of them are actually reviews for size 8 sea shoes ! Nothing to do with the item listed .
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife for our snorkeling trip to Hawaii. She isn't the greatest swimmer, and gets cold in her water so we thought this might be a good solution. It was her first wetsuit and it took awhile to figure out how to put it on and use properly. One she got it on--and she looks great in it!--she really enjoyed being able to swim with the added support. The water was warm enough that she didn't really need it per se, but she appreciated the extra support and protection. A great wetsuit all in all. This will be getting lots more use.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Davisson

customer_reviews.title: Keep the burn at bay!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this wetsuit. Nice quality stretching fabric and looks very nice, it’s well-made, easy to get into, and really cute. It keeps the cold water out Better than I ever could have expected. It's so easy to get a burn on your back while snorkeling, you tend to lose track of time and your back sucks up all those rays, this suit makes a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: Good product, seems built to last
customer_reviews.text: Although this was a gift for someone else, I'm told the fit was perfect for the size, and it appeared to be very well constructed. My friend swims in endurance races, and the river and streams of western Pennsylvania are fairly chilly in the spring and early summer, when many of them take place. She reports that the suit provided adequate warm, and wasn't binding for swimming. She said she likes it enough that she would have bought it for herself if I hadn't given it to her. Seems to be a solid, well-made product that lives up to its claims.
customer_reviews.author: K. Harriger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for swimming in colder waters.
customer_reviews.text: Lake Superior has many nice swimming areas, but the waters are so cold that you can usually not stay in for more than 20 minutes even in late July without getting very chilled. In some areas, where deep waters lie close offshore, the water never gets much above icy. Wearing a full wetsuit would certainly help keep you warmer, but would look pretty dorky for casual beach swimming. This shorty wetsuit is a perfect compromise, greatly conserving your core body heat (and making that initial plunge somewhat less shocking) while still looking sporty and sexy. This suit looks very well made, and fits our teenage daughter very well. It makes me want one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzbean

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and looks nice on
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this wetsuit! It fits nicely (sizing tends to be small so check the measurements) and it's very comfy. This is more of a Spring suit if you want to go in the ocean, currently I use it at the pool to stay warm and protect myself from the sun. I used to have a rash guard for that but so happy I have this now. Also make sure that you go by the sizing chart from manufacturer, I'm usually a size 4 and a 6 was snug on me. I should have gotten a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Y. C. M.

customer_reviews.title: great look and fit, though neck is a little tight
customer_reviews.text: This suit looks and feels great, though bear in mind these things are Hot out of water, so don't plan to wear them for a long time outside on warmer days unless you want to sweat intensely and be rather uncomfortable. The only critique I have, which others shared as well, was that the neck is a bit tight. Other than that, this is very comfortable and looks amazing on pretty much any body type!
customer_reviews.author: Hedera Femme

customer_reviews.title: Nice suit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this suit. She feels warmer in our freezing lake. She loves the water and is a fish. This fits around her very skinny 11 year old body. I think it will fit her for the next couple of years. I am happy with the ease of the on and off long zipper pull cord. This is a nice suit and i hope it lasts for a while. I will update my review if this has any problems.
customer_reviews.author: LoveBooks

customer_reviews.title: looks great, fits well, tight neck though
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter who will be learning to scuba dive. It is nicely made with a 2.8 mm thick material and solid seams. It looks great on her. The only problem is that she doesn't like how tight the neck is. It makes her feel uncomfortable, like she's choking. This may be her particular issue since she also doesn't like turtlenecks or a buttoned up collar.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works well
customer_reviews.text: This shorty wetsuit fits well; perhaps runs a little small, but is well cut. It does what it should, which is to keep me much warmer than I would be otherwise when conditions are such that I don’t want a full wetsuit. The seams look good; I expect this will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: It's Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: True to size and very easy on and off with a well made pull tab zipper. Very high quality, IMO. Great for body boarding.
customer_reviews.author: AshertopiA

product_meta.title: Phantom Aquatics Women's Voda Premium Shorty Wetsuit
product_meta.description: When a little warmth is all you need, stay comfortable and protected with the Voda Premium 2.8mm Shorty suit. This suit is ideal for scuba or snorkeling. When you get home, you will remember the fun and not the sunburn. The colors and stylish graphics compliment the rest of the Phantom Aquatics products.
feature_bullets: Should fit snug, but not too tight
Quick-drying fabric provides for an exceptional wear, Super stretch fabric provides for exceptional flexibility
UPF 50+ UV protection helps shield you from the sun's harmful rays,
2.8mm thickness, flatlock stitching helps minimize irritation
Seamless Paddle Zones to maximize comfort, double Super Seal neck, zippered/hook-and-loop closure at back
Short sleeves, all panels are bonded to Neoprene, rinse with fresh water, line Dry
